title: league of legends players need to grow some balls

replies.body:
While Necromancy may be handy (and sometimes needed) in video games, it's not the case for old forum threads. Please avoid using such magic and be mindful of how old threads are before posting.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.

I looked at all your games today (the publicly available data on op.gg) and there is absolutely no evidence to suggest anyone was "hard inting" or even intentionally feeding to begin with.

Players are not going to be punished for being bad at the game. You have no right to flame someone for being bad, *or* for intentionally feeding even if they *were* doing that.

If you think your ban was undeserved, please post your chat logs to prove as much.
you can't force players to be more tough, not everyone is in perfect mental health and or take this game seriously.

Considering that even people who aren't mentally challenged seem to "not be able to take criticism", according to some people, maybe the issue isn't the people who "can't take criticism", but the people who can't deliver good criticism?

We signed up to play League, not to be given unwanted criticism in the middle of a match.
Neither to deal with mentally challenged noobs who troll our game ;)

Well, there's no way you'd be able to discern someone who's mentally challenged from someone who isn't. And, if you're getting "noobs", you might want to see about criticising yourself, since you get matched with players of similar skill level.
Yes, because disco nunus in my team surely show how I play....

Well, when you say "noobs", you're talking about people of low skill, who are "new" to the game. 'Cause, "noobs" = "newbies". So, getting noobs implies you're getting players of low skill, implying that your MMR is low enough to be encountering players who aren't skilled/play like they're new.

If you're talking genuine trolls, then _they're not noobs, and criticising them is going to do fuck all besides entice them to troll harder._ _**Do not feed the trolls**_, it's a basic Internet rule.

So, if you're getting noobs, you're going to have to suck it up and prove you're better than them and climb to a higher MMR. If you're getting trolls, you're going to have to _not give them the reaction they want_, _report them_, and _**move on**_.

End of discussion.

Sadly it doesn't fckin matter.

And we signed up to not be dragged down in a rank game for a player that doesn't know what dragon is. Leave that shit in aram. Or did you sign up to be bad at a video game. is that how you attack life.. let's get this job but be bad at it. You're mad cause you're bad.
